Module chav1961.purelib

Package chav1961.purelib.basic.interfaces

This package contains all important interfaces for the basic abilities of the library

Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
LastUpdate:
0.0.4
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BasicScriptEngineController
    This interface extends functionality of the standard Java ScriptEngine interface.
    BPlusTreeNode<Id,​K extends java.lang.Comparable<? super K>,​V>  
    CharStreamPrinter<T>
    This interface contains useful methods to print different content to character stream.
    ConsoleManagerInterface
    This interface describes a console command manager.
    ConvertorInterface  
    FSMProcessor<Terminal extends java.lang.Enum<?>,​Parameter>
    This interface describes any Finite State Machine (FSM) processor.
    InputStreamGetter
    This interface produces input stream to get content of the manipulated entity on saving
    LineByLineProcessorCallback
    This interface uses with the LineByLineProcessor class to support lambda-styled callback for it
    LoggerFacade
    This interface is a facade for different loggers.
    LoggerFacade.LoggerCallbackInterface
    This functional interface allow use conditional tracing
    ModifiableEntity
    This interface describes any object having unsaved modifications.
    ModuleAccessor
    This interface must be used to grant access from inner unnamed modules to any own modules for on-the-fly code was built
    ModuleExporter
    This class is used in conjunction with Java 9 module system to grant access for all on-the-fly generated classes inside the given class to external modules.
    OnlineBooleanGetter
    This interface describes dynamic access to linked boolean variable
    OnlineCharGetter
    This interface describes dynamic access to linked character variable
    OnlineDoubleGetter
    This interface describes dynamic access to linked double variable
    OnlineFloatGetter
    This interface describes dynamic access to linked float variable
    OnlineGetter
    This interface is a parent for set of interfaces to get dynamic access to linked variables
    OnlineIntGetter
    This interface describes dynamic access to linked int variable
    OnlineLongGetter
    This interface describes dynamic access to linked long variable
    OnlineObjectGetter<T>
    This interface describes dynamic access to linked Object variable
    OnlineStringGetter
    This interface describes dynamic access to linked String variable
    OutputStreamGetter
    This interface produces output stream to set content of the manipulated entity on loading
    ProgressIndicator
    This interface can be used for indicating long time processing progress in applications.
    PureLibColorScheme
    This interface contains a set of keys used for color schemas in the Pure Library.
    SpiService<Type>
    This interface describes any SPI member.
    SyntaxTreeInterface<T>
    This interface describes a quick syntax tree to store strings and associate any data to them for use in the parsers.
    SyntaxTreeInterface.Walker<T>
    This interface describes processing all terminal nodes in the tree.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LoggerFacade.Reducing
    This enumeration describes reducing algorithms used in the logger
    LoggerFacade.Severity
    This enumeration describes message severity
